data.prayer: Father, encourage the 132,059 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Baiyin, Gansu, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Baiyin, Gansu, China so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Baiyin, Gansu, China to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Baiyin, Gansu, China to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Baiyin, Gansu, China.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 132,059 believers living in the county of Baiyin. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.section_summary:
the county of Baiyin, Gansu, China has a population of 1,740,800.

We estimate Baiyin has 132,059 people who might know Jesus, 28,122 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,580,619 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Baiyin, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.
